lore: It was in fact the appearance of the Voidlords that finally proved something was not quite right, though the Auditors were already aware of this. These terrible creatures were moving from the void into the Itherian Realms, and from there entering the world created by the Gods.\n\nWhen a Hemomancer tastes another creature's blood, it can tell whether they are telling the truth for twenty-four hours. In addition, Hemomancer Seers can read blood splatters to see everything that happened for an hour after the substance was spilled.
menagerieDialog: (You can tell by the cool and calculated look on its face that it's hatching a new, sinister scheme.)
There's no time to waste - let's go.
(It's pouring blood back and forth between two vials. Interesting hobby.)
(It stares at you in silence, refusing to say anything. How stubborn!)
What am I doing? The same thing I do every night, {PLAYERNAME}. Trying to take over the world!
name: Hemomancer Seer
